Editor Commands

Ctrl Ctrl Space Autocomplete (if available)
F Find
G Find Next
⇧G Find Previous
Shift F Opt F Find & Replace
[ Indent Code Right
] Indent Code Left
⇧ Tab Auto Indent Code
/ Line Comment
⇧ Opt / Block Comment

Also see: Tab Triggers

HTML Specific

⇧A Wrap With...

Misc

⇧7 Re-run Preview
⇧8 Clear All Analyze Errors
⇧9 Open This Dialog

Pen Actions

P Create New Pen
S Save
I Info Panel (if owned)
Ignore
